did.unittitle: The political and economic relations of English and American Quakers (1750-1785), 1935
did.abstract: This dissertation analyzes Quaker political and economic attitudes in relation to the Seven Years' War, the American Revolution, Indians, and slaves.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Purchased from Oxford University (Â£3) and accessioned, 1963 (1963 837mf). See in-house shelf list for additional accession information.
